The paragraph is discussing the interaction between two drugs, flecainide and paroxetine, and the potential impact on flecainide plasma concentrations due to paroxetine being a potent CYP2D6 inhibitor. It does not mention any specific diseases.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |
| Toxicity (potential complication of flecainide and CYP2D6 inhibitors interaction) |

The paragraph mentions the potential occurrence of toxicity as a complication when flecainide is prescribed with CYP2D6 inhibitors. Therefore, toxicity is the valid disease entity in the paragraph.
